html:
11.3.24  3:27 pm   Do you have to try to make your music and animations feel "different"? Or is that just how it comes out?

      i'm not sure if you mean different from other people, or different from what i may have already done. being different from other people takes no effort and i can't even help that. being different from what i've already done, to the extent that it's possible, is a fun but quite easy challenge

11.3.24  1:05 pm   thoughts on san francisco?

      the street signs don't say 'street' or 'road' or anything. you have to just figure that part out yourself

11.3.24  11:17 am   The intersection of Bloor and high park ave is a magical place that I both saw the northern lights, and got on a subway train that was just..... chilling in the station without any lights on, which was interesting (both on the same night, too). Any reason in particular you feel like you've spend a bunch of time at that intersection? Have you just..... actually been there?

      i seem to have this memory of seeing someone literally turn into a pretzel. but that's not important right now

11.3.24  9:15 am   when you answer these questions do you question your answers?

      sometimes

11.3.24  8:46 am   why are your songs so insane, the instruments the chord progressions the BASSLINES the LYRICS

      just trying to get by

11.3.24  7:32 am   what range do  you usually have set on the pitch bend wheel

      2 or 12

11.3.24  4:41 am   Who let the cat out of the bag?

      cat never was in bag

11.3.24  4:06 am   is how comfy beds are a spectrum? Is there one true comfiest bed? 

      no

11.3.24  3:09 am   why did you choose to learn Dutch?

      actually what happened was i sort of chose to ignore the urge to learn it, for most of my life until about 2023

11.3.24  2:03 am   What isn't a chord?

      a cord

11.3.24  1:28 am   Are you learning Dutch? What language are you learning?

      i've recently boosted my dutch from 75% to 85%, i've boosted my french from 10% to 15%, i've boosted my spanish from 2% to 7%, i've boosted my italian from 2% to 3% and boosted my russian from .03% to 1%. these numbers represent a percentage of comfortable listening comprehension, but it's important to remember that all of those numbers are drastically innacurate

11.3.24  1:16 am   aYOUR LITTLE CHARACTER MODELS ARE SO CUTE THEY MAKE ME EMOTIONAL

      my goodness i have some fairly good news for you at some point

11.3.24  1:12 am   How could the physical structure of a complex system result in a subjective awareness? 

      in this case, 'consciously'

11.3.24  12:21 am   Could you list at least 10 things that you think are otherworldly?

      10 different worlds, each one to another

11.2.24  9:32 pm   Do you think we're all connected?  ^_^

      only when we make that exact face

11.2.24  9:13 pm   i cant do improv comedy with other people by myself. i kinda need the other people to have other people be part of the content. so i need to get creative and do it without others or get creative and find/convince people

      either strategy here is fine. i just hope you don't shame yourself for which ever decision seems right for you

11.2.24  7:25 pm   how is it that your music is so great ? Is there cocaine in it?

      i've been very careful never to touch cocaine. i suspect i might like it

11.2.24  7:24 pm   i'm visiting nyc in december. any recommendations for live music?

      in this case maybe you should make your own

11.2.24  6:17 pm   I hope you like cheese because I am going to sell you a bunch

      i only rent cheese

11.2.24  5:13 pm   Are you learning any other languages besides Dutch?

      yes

11.2.24  4:04 pm   one of my favorite animations by you is Perfect. because it's just interesting.

     my goodness i have some pretty good news for you

      and one of the parts that stuck with me has to be "these cars know everything, which unfortunately cancels out, and so they know nothing. / they know nothing? / feel nothing. they know everything, so they don't care." was there any inspiration for this part? because it's a really cool part in my opinion

     yeah, pretty much just inspired by cold hard reality

11.2.24  3:09 pm   do you collect anything?

      sometimes yes

11.2.24  2:49 pm   How do I know if I'm ugly or not

      it's actually better not to know

11.2.24  2:30 pm   What are dog?

      non-cat

11.2.24  1:46 pm   What editing programs, voice modification effects do you use?

      i don't use any voice modification effects

11.2.24  10:41 am   You ever walked down Bloor St?

      in some weird way i feel like i've spent an exorbitant amount of time at the corner of high park ave

11.2.24  9:54 am   i heard you are working on a bunch of videos right now. i'm super excited for them. my question is, i remember you saying before that you wouldn't make an album because you preferred to make one song at a time and then release it right when it's done. what's the reason you're working on a bunch of things (videos instead of songs i guess) at once this time?

      not entirely following your logic here, but i'll try to make some sense out of some of the pieces. not liking albums: true. enjoying releasing individual songs: true. producing a group of videos at the same time (not necessarily releasing them at the same time): also cool, and doesn't even preclude nor contradict the previous data points

11.2.24  9:06 am   If I died, but I survived, would I be alive or dead? Because on one hand I died, so I'd be dead, but on the other hand I survived, so I'd be alive. Please help it's very urgent

      as you said, you'd be both. if you were both, you would be both

11.2.24  6:28 am   what is your favourite planet outside of our solar system?

      i don't know much about them yet

11.2.24  5:56 am   i'm about to do the dishes

      ok, keep me updated

11.2.24  3:41 am   What is the meaning of life?

      what do you want it to be

11.2.24  2:49 am   what happens after things get ruined?

      you can fix things, or make new things, sometimes both actually

11.2.24  2:25 am   what's more annoying: the sand at the beach or the water at the beach?

      what's annoying is when there's only one or the other

11.2.24  2:16 am   why do you answer these questions

      to prove i can

11.2.24  12:52 am   quick reharmonize this: Dmin7 G7 Cmaj7

      unless there's a melody, reharm doesnt mean much. for example, like a blank piece of green peper. imagine this blank green paper as a blank other color. actually, i take it all back. the correct answer is B-7 E7 Amaj7

11.2.24  12:41 am   have you written any songs where the title is never said in the song?

      sure

11.2.24  12:25 am   least favorite mode of transportation?

      every time i try to think of one i don't like, as soon as i describe it seems to become likeable somehow

11.1.24  9:59 pm   I have to share with you something I've found recently. It turns out when you flip over the letter w, it looks almost exactly like the letter m. It even works the other way around

      crazy, that's like the letter R and the letter Я

11.1.24  9:50 pm   would you eat a bagel if it was the sun

      no

11.1.24  8:37 pm   all prime numbers other than 2 and 3 are either 1 above or 1 below a multiple of 6, no exceptions.

      yes i'm aware of that

11.1.24  8:29 pm   what to do if you love someone but know you'll never be able to be with them?

      find love elsewhere. news flash it's everywhere

11.1.24  7:04 pm   what are your thoughts on emergent behavior

      seems pretty chill

11.1.24  6:41 pm   when you forget what month it is and say something as if it was a different month then realize its a month do you say its another month and run into a wall

      no

11.1.24  6:06 pm   Why do people think the things they say are shocking when they're actually very predictable?

      maybe they just like how shocking it always is when everyone else does it

11.1.24  4:23 pm   Have you seen the Aurora Borealis? If not, what are your thoughts on it?

      seems chill

11.1.24  2:48 pm   what is your opinion on maple syrup

      iconic

11.1.24  2:39 pm   i dont understand how dolly parton plays guitar with such long fingernails. mine grow the tiniest little bit and everything starts to feel wrong. i'm glad it works for her though because it looks nice and sounds good.

is there any artist you have similar feelings about? like, how do they ___ with all that ____ (or without any ___)?

      sometimes i wonder how younger people can be so young, without being ..... older yet

11.1.24  1:01 pm   is there something everyone on the planet, no exception, would agree is good? trying to find some comfortable common ground for those occasions where i have to face Other People

      don't forget, to the other person, you're the other person

11.1.24  10:44 am   Thoughts on Toronto?

      when i think about Toronto, i cannot escape the fiery gaze of the great Joseph Bloor penetrating into my soul

11.1.24  10:01 am   How do I draw A straight line? I try to draw A simple square, it turns into A wonky square. I try to copy the wonky square, it's even more wonky.

      you can use your iphone. just lay your iphone on the table and trace the pencil along the edge of the iphone
